Articles.Content:
How much fun is this!

reminds me of Little big planet, would be great to see some ideas like that, Buttons to push that activate switches/levers.

How much fun is this!

reminds me of Little big planet, would be great to see some ideas like that, Buttons to push that activate switches/levers.

Now put a small engine and fuel tank underneath it, then attach it to a large rocket and launch it into space
Ive already got one ready and waiting on the moon, Haha i had it breaking dancing for hours cos it got stuck upside down. then the lander legs, some got stuck up some down. Wasn\'t as frighting.

Ive already got one ready and waiting on the moon, Haha i had it breaking dancing for hours cos it got stuck upside down. then the lander legs, some got stuck up some down. Wasn\'t as frighting.

haha, Brilliant, I\'m currently building a Mun-capable Lunar lander with return pod, It\'s rather stressful haha, gonna use the Carts plugin to get a rover
